alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 12:06PM EST until January 06 at 11:36AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Austell affecting Cobb and Douglas Counties. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Austell, Austell, Austell, Sweetwater Creek below Austell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Austell. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage near the Interstate 20 bridge. Portions of a paintball playing field just downstream of the bridge and athletic fields in the Woodrow Wilson Park on Mount Vernon Road are flooded with one to two feet of water. A portion of Wren Circle in Douglas County...the County Iron Works and Sunlight Drive in Cobb County begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 10 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
